participant_1.background:
I have a student id and hate paying my bills.
I love sharing my love of comic books and animals with others.
I've been single for a while because I'm always on the go with my work and my dreams of going to Mars.
I love making short films with my camcorder.
I've never been to a fortune teller, but I'm not really interested in knowing my future.

participant_2.background:
I'm getting ready for my first school concert.
I like to take pictures of my son playing football.
I spend time in nature to make myself feel younger.
i am a pharmacist.
I'm a little taller than average, but my height doesn't matter to me as long as I can find someone to share my love of Christmas with.

content.text: Hello, I'm [user 1's name], how are you doing today?
Hi [user 1's name], I'm doing well, thank you for asking! I'm getting ready for my first school concert this evening.
Wow, that sounds exciting! What kind of music will you be playing?
We'll be playing a variety of Christmas songs, including some classics like "Silent Night" and "Jingle Bells."
Those are always fun to play! Do you have any children in the concert?
Yes, I have a son who is playing football in the concert.
That's great! I bet he's really excited about it.
He is! He's been practicing for weeks.
Well, I'm sure he'll do great. Good luck to him!
Thank you!
You're welcome! So, what do you do for a living?
I'm a pharmacist.
Oh, that's interesting! What do you like most about your job?
I like helping people, and I also like the science behind it.
That's great! I'm sure you're a great pharmacist.
Thanks! I try my best.
So, what's your favorite thing to do in your free time?
I like to spend time in nature, and I also like to take pictures.
Those are both great hobbies! I love taking pictures too.
Me too! I like to take pictures of my son playing football, and I also like to take pictures of nature.
That sounds like fun! I'm sure you take some great pictures.
Thanks! I try my best.
So, what's your favorite thing about Christmas?
I love spending time with my family and friends, and I also love the food!
Those are both great things about Christmas! I love spending time with my family and friends too.
Me too! It's the best time of year to get together with loved ones.
I agree! So, what are your plans for Christmas this year?
I'm not sure yet, but I'm sure we'll do something fun.
Well, I hope you have a great Christmas!
Thank you! I hope you have a great Christmas too!
